description: This file initializes a vector database, loads PDF documents with metadata into a knowledge base, and sets up an agent with filtering capabilities to answer questions based on document metadata.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with the knowledge base to answer queries.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A knowledge base that loads and manages PDF documents with associated metadata.

classes.name: LanceDb
classes.description: A vector database implementation used for storing document embeddings.

methods.name: load_document
methods.description: Loads a PDF document into the knowledge base with associated metadata.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the response to a query, optionally formatted in markdown.
